column5: Providing a comprehensive introduction to business and management, this Masters course is ideal for those who haven't studied these subjects before.Based in the triple-accredited Leeds University Business School, our researchers and professional practitioners will provide you with a wide range of insight into how organisations operate.You’ll also develop the essential management skills that employers value, including critical thinking, analytical skills, problem-solving and collaborative working.Thanks to our strong links with businesses worldwide, you’ll have opportunities to connect with leaders from a range of organisations to support your preparation for a career in business.
